artist: Robert Cottingham; Published by Parasol Press Ltd., New York
creditline: Gift of Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: detail of train car; brown/yellow/green; metal ladder along left side; wheel/gear UR; metal parts among black shadows
medium: Color aquatint, lift ground, and spit-bite
provenance: [Parasol Press (publisher), New York; sold to Palmer]; Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer, Orono, Minn. (until 2014; given to MIA)
title: Rolling Stock, For Jesse
